title: UD introduces new President
content:
DAYTON, Ohio (WDTN) – The University of Dayton introduced Dr. Eric Spina as the 19th president to take the helm at the University of Dayton Tuesday morning. 
 
As a news conference, current President Dan Curran introduced Spina and welcomed him to the Flyer family: 
   
Dan Curran addresses Eric Spina and his family saying "welcome to the University of Dayton." pic.twitter.com/1Xkz8ZQzhv 
 
— University of Dayton (@univofdayton) September 15, 2015 
 
 
Spina was presented with some UD apparel because, as Curran said, “He has too much orange in his closet.” 
   
And with that, Eric Spina is officially a Flyer. Welcome Home #UDNewPrez ! pic.twitter.com/fMiPKjuhm8 
 
— University of Dayton (@univofdayton) September 15, 2015 
 
 
Spina also spoke about returning to Dayton after UD met Syracuse on the basketball court last year: 
   
"Little did I know, 18 months later, our paths would cross again." —Spina, with a smile, on the UD v. Syracuse game. pic.twitter.com/vkwktSjXCR 
 
— University of Dayton (@univofdayton) September 15, 2015 
 
 
Mayor Nan Whaley also took to twitter to welcome Dr. Eric Spina to the community: 
   
Welcome Dr. Eric Spina #UDNewPrez ! I look forward to the @cityofdayton & @univofdayton continuing our partnership to move Dayton forward! 
 
— Nan Whaley (@nanwhaley) September 15, 2015
